content:

A lot of it is about finding your common values and goals, and speaking to those

Sadly I've never become much of a meditator but the part about meditation is nice too
I've never mastered meditation either, so instead I do things like pottery and other crafts â€“ I think it helps center me
I take walks, it's the best I can do ðŸ™‚
